channel.title: Posts on Website of Khanh Nguyen
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Website of Khanh Nguyen

item.title: Find First and Last Position
item.description: Find First and Last Position in Sorted Array Given an array of integers nums sorted in ascending order, find the starting and ending position of a given target value.

item.title: Subsets
item.description: Subsets Description Given a collection of integers that contains unique nums, return all possible subsets (the power set).

item.title: Permutations
item.description: Permutations Description Given a collection of distinct integers, return all possible permutations

item.title: Find All Duplicates Array
item.description: Find All Duplicates in an Array Description Given an array of integers, 1 ≤ a[i] ≤ n (n = size of array), some elements appear twice and others appear once.

item.title: Minimum Cost for Tickets
item.description: Minimum Cost For Tickets Description In a country popular for train travel, you have planned some train travelling one year in advance.

item.title: Meeting Rooms
item.description: Meeting Rooms II Description Given an array of meeting time intervals consisting of start and end times [[s1,e1],[s2,e2],…] (si < ei), find the minimum number of conference rooms required.

item.title: Find Min in Rotated Sorted Array
item.description: Find Min in Rotated Sorted Array Description Suppose an array sorted in ascending order is rotated at some pivot unknown to you beforehand.

item.title: Subarray Sum Equals K
item.description: Subarray Sum Equals K Description Given an array of integers and an integer k, you need to find the total number of continuous subarrays whose sum equals to k.

item.title: Circular Array Loop
item.description: Circular Array Loop Description You are given a circular array nums of positive and negative integers.

item.title: Binary Tree Right Size View
item.description: Binary Tree Right Size Description Given a binary tree, imagine yourself standing on the right side of it, return the values of the nodes you can see ordered from top to bottom.

item.title: Square Root
item.description: Square Root Description Implement int sqrt(int x). Compute and return the square root of x, where x is guaranteed to be a non-negative integer.

item.title: Generate Parentheses
item.description: Generate Parantheses Description Given n pairs of parentheses, write a function to generate all combinations of well-formed parentheses.

item.title: Combination Sum
item.description: Combination Sum Description Given an array of distinct integers candidates and a target integer target, return a list of all unique combinations of candidates where the chosen numbers sum to target.

item.title: Integer to Roman
item.description: Integer to Roman Description Roman numerals are represented by seven different symbols: I, V, X, L, C, D and M.

item.title: Sort Colors
item.description: Sort Colors Description Given an array nums with n objects colored red, white, or blue, sort them in-place so that objects of the same color are adjacent, with the colors in the order red, white, and blue.

item.title: Wiggle Sort
item.description: Wiggle Sort Description Given an unsorted array nums, reorder it in-place such that nums[0] <= nums[1] >= nums[2] <= nums[3]….

item.title: Min Move for Knight
item.description: Minimum Move For A Knight Description In a finite chess board with coordinates, a knight start an index startRow, startCol.

item.title: Top K Frequent Elements
item.description: Top K Frequent Elements Description Given a non-empty array of integers, return the k most frequent elements.

item.title: Lowest Common Ancestor
item.description: Lowest Common Ancestor in BST Description Given a binary search tree (BST), find the lowest common ancestor (LCA) of two given nodes in the BST.

item.title: Binary Tree Max Path Sum
item.description: Binary Tree Max Path Sum Description Given a non-empty binary tree, find the maximum path sum.

item.title: Sum Root to Leaf Numbers
item.description: Sum Root to Leaf Numbers Description Given a binary tree containing digits from 0-9 only, each root-to-leaf path could represent a number.

item.title: Kth Smallest Element in BST
item.description: Kth Smallest Element in BST Description Given a binary search tree, write a function kthSmallest to find the kth smallest element in it.

item.title: Partition Labels
item.description: Partition Labels Description A string S of lowercase English letters is given.

item.title: Remove Duplicates in Sorted Array
item.description: Remove Duplicates from Sorted Array Description Given a sorted array nums, remove the duplicates in-place such that each element appears only once and returns the new length.

item.title: Merge Sorted Array
item.description: Merge Sorted Array Description Given two sorted integer arrays nums1 and nums2, merge nums2 into nums1 as one sorted array.

item.title: Swap Zeroes
item.description: Swap Zeroes Description Given an array nums, write a function to move all 0’s to the end of it while maintaining the relative order of the non-zero elements.

item.title: Binary Tree From Preorder and Inorder Traversal
item.description: Construct Binary Tree from Preorder and Inorder Traversal Description Given preorder and inorder traversal of a tree, construct the binary tree.

item.title: Binary Tree Order Traversal
item.description: Description Desciption Given a binary tree, return the level order traversal of its nodes’ values.

item.title: Invert Tree
item.description: Invert Tree Description Invert a binary tree. Solution We recurse on the root node.

item.title: Same Tree
item.description: Same Tree Description Given two binary trees, write a function to check if they are the same or not.

item.title: Maximum Depth Binary Tree
item.description: Maximum Depth Binary Tree Description Given a binary tree, find its maximum depth.

item.title: Longest Palindromic Substring
item.description: Longest Palindromic Substring Description Given a string s, find the longest palindromic substring in s.

item.title: Palindrome Substring
item.description: Palindrome Substring Given a string, your task is to count how many palindromic substrings in this string.

item.title: Group Anagram
item.description: Group Anagram Description Given an array of strings strs, group the anagrams together.

item.title: Valid Anagram
item.description: Valid Anagram Given two strings s and t , write a function to determine if t is an anagram of s.

item.title: Longest Repeating Char Replacement
item.description: Longest Repeating Character Replacement Description Given a string s that consists of only uppercase English letters, you can perform at most k operations on that string.

item.title: Longest Substring Without Repeated Chars
item.description: Longest Substring Without Repeated Character Description Given a string s, find the length of the longest substring without repeating characters.

item.title: Set Matrix Zeroes
item.description: Set Matrix Zeroes Description Given an m x n matrix. If an element is 0, set its entire row and column to 0.

item.title: Merge K sorted lists
item.description: Merge K Sorted Lists Description You are given an array of k linked-lists lists, each linked-list is sorted in ascending order.

item.title: Non Overlapping Interval
item.description: Non Overlapping Interval Description Given a collection of intervals, find the minimum number of intervals you need to remove to make the rest of the intervals non-overlapping.

item.title: Merge Intervals
item.description: Merge Intervals Description Given a collection of intervals, merge all overlapping intervals.

item.title: Reverse Linked List
item.description: Reverse Linked List Description Reverse a singly linked list. Solution We use 2 pointers to store prev and curr.

item.title: Pacific Atlanti Water Flow
item.description: Pacific Atlantic Water Flow Description Given an m x n matrix of non-negative integers representing the height of each unit cell in a continent, the “Pacific ocean” touches the left and top edges of the matrix and the “Atlantic ocean” touches the right and bottom edges.

item.title: Number of Islands
item.description: Number of Islands Description Given a 2d grid map of ‘1’s (land) and ‘0’s (water), count the number of islands.

item.title: Course Schedule
item.description: Course Schedule Description There are a total of numCourses courses you have to take, labeled from 0 to numCourses-1.

item.title: Server Missing
item.description: Server Missing Description // Given an array of server ids as integers.

item.title: Clone Graph
item.description: Clone Graph Description Given a reference of a node in a connected undirected graph.

item.title: Missing X Number
item.description: Missing Numbers Description We have an array from 1 to N with one number missing, we would like to find the missing number.

item.title: Jump Game
item.description: Jump Game Description Given an array of non-negative integers, you are initially positioned at the first index of the array.

item.title: Unique Paths
item.description: Unique Paths Description A robot is located at the top-left corner of a m x n grid (marked ‘Start’ in the diagram below).

item.title: Decode Ways
item.description: Decode Ways Description A message containing letters from A-Z is being encoded to numbers using the following mapping:

item.title: Combination Sum IV
item.description: Combination Sum IV Description Given an integer array with all positive numbers and no duplicates, find the number of possible combinations that add up to a positive integer target.

item.title: Length of Increasing Sub
item.description: Length of Increasing Subsequence Description Given an unsorted array of integers, find the length of longest increasing subsequence.

item.title: Parse Int
item.description: String to Integer Description Parse a string to an integer not using built in function.

item.title: Coin Change
item.description: Coin Change Description You are given coins of different denominations and a total amount of money amount.

item.title: House Robber II
item.description: House Robber II Description You are a professional robber planning to rob houses along a street.

item.title: Longest Common Subsequence
item.description: Longest Common Subsequence Description Given two strings text1 and text2, return the length of their longest common subsequence.

item.title: House Robber
item.description: Housr Robber Description You are a professional robber planning to rob houses along a street.

item.title: Climbing Stairs
item.description: Climbing Stairs Description You are climbing a stair case. It takes n steps to reach to the top.

item.title: Three Sum
item.description: Three Sum Description Given an array nums of n integers, are there elements a, b, c in nums such that a + b + c = 0?

item.title: Search in Rotated Sorted Array
item.description: Search in Rotated Sorted Array Description Suppose an array sorted in ascending order is rotated at some pivot unknown to you beforehand.

item.title: Find Minimum in Rotated Sorted Array
item.description: Find Minimum in Rotated Sorted Array Description Suppose an array sorted in ascending order is rotated at some pivot unknown to you beforehand.

item.title: Maximum Product Subarray
item.description: Maximum Product Subarray Description Given an integer array nums, find the contiguous subarray within an array (containing at least one number) which has the largest product.

item.title: Container With Most Water
item.description: Container With Most Water Description Given n non-negative integers a1, a2, …, an , where each represents a point at coordinate (i, ai).

item.title: Max Subarray
item.description: Max Subarray Description Given an integer array nums, find the contiguous subarray (containing at least one number) which has the largest sum and return its sum.

item.title: Product of Array Except Self
item.description: Product of array except self Given an array nums of n integers where n > 1, return an array output such that output[i] is equal to the product of all the elements of nums except nums[i].

item.title: Contain Duplicate
item.description: Contain Duplicates Description Given an array of integers, find if the array contains any duplicates.

item.title: Best Time to Buy and Sell Stocks
item.description: Since it was so difficult to start leetcode. I think it will be better if I document each problem that I solve every day.

item.title: Getting That Internship
item.description: It’s funny to see my initial summer plan that I made a month ago, which I have not accomplished any of the goal I set up other than creating personal website.

item.title: CDCL Algorithm
item.description: Formal Verification I had the fortunate to carry out an independent study with Dr.

item.title: Summer Plan 2020
item.description: Usually I like to write my To Do on the sticky notes application on Mac.

item.title: Welcome! This is my first blog
item.description: I’ll try to write some blogs on this website though it is for my personal use.
